Description.Name: Engine Repairs
Description.Details: Turns out the engine mounts are almost completely rusted away commander. We're gonna need to rebuild them before we can start fixing the engines, otherwise they'll rip themselves out under too much stress. Increases Drop Weight Limit by 50 tons

AssignedCastDescription: Frankly I'm surprised there's been no disasters already, Boss. No one reported this to me. If you happen to notice any of my 'techs on septic tank duty over the coming weeks, I promise it's completely unrelated.
